relevant_findings.neurological: Subtle weakness of facial muscles (sparing forehead), minimal palatal elevation, absence of triceps, patellar, and Achilles reflexes on both sides.
relevant_findings.muscular: Proximal and distal muscle strength intact.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Frequent coughing and clearing of secretions, hoarse and hypophonic voice with hypernasal resonance, rhonchi at lung bases.
Improved breath sounds; rhonchi were less prominent than previous examination.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition unchanged except for improved breath sounds.
